name: Federal Ecological and Quility of Life Messures
description: This is a collection of laws that aim to prove QoL and Ecological incentives.

properties.Title: Let the Arrows Fly
properties.UserDescription: This arrow allows free hunting on all land. Owners may request that their land be exempt from this law at any time. Turtles and Otters are also exempt from this law.

Location.contextDescription: The position where the interaction took place.

properties.Title: Tree Stump Tax
properties.UserDescription: This law attempts to tax creating tree stumps on unowned land.

Left.contextDescription: A value of 100 represents a fully grown tree, 0 represents a newly-planted seed.

properties.Title: Tree Stump Payment
properties.UserDescription: This law attempts to pay for clearing stumps on unowned land.

properties.Title: Tree Debris Tax
properties.UserDescription: This law attempts to tax someone for creating tree debris on unowned land.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

LeftNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Citizen.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.
The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

LeftNumber.contextDescription: The number of debris blocks created in this action.

Target.contextDescription: The citizen who chopped down the tree that is generating debris.

properties.Title: Tree Debris Payment
properties.UserDescription: This law attempts to pay for cleaning up tree debris on unowned land.

properties.Title: Free Vehicle Placement
properties.UserDescription: This law allows the freedom to place vehicles on owned land.
